title: Register to Vote
description: Register to vote in California or confirm your registration status! All voters must be registered by October 21st.

title: Find Your Polling Place
description: Locate the polling place nearest to you using our search feature!

title: Early Voting
description: Early voting begins in Voter's Choice Act counties starting October 26th!

title: Election Day
description: Election day takes place on November 5th, on which all polling places will be open!
